description:
After barely escaping from Garp, Lina`s party heads to Dragon Valley in Catart mountain range to find a copy of Claire Bible.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikukkyanai! Dragon no Tani o Mezase!
N-avem de ales! Pornim spre valea dragonilor
No Other Choice! Set Course for Dragon Valley!
On y va ! (cap sur la vallée des Dragons)
Выбора нет! Курс на Долину драконов!
いくっきゃないっ! ドラゴンの谷を目指せ!
